summary: The adventures of the three Brad brothers continues when Traian falls in love with Anabelle, a singer. He wants to marry her, not knowing that she is helping someone to rob a bank.
cast: Ilarion Ciobanu|Ovidiu Iuliu Moldovan|Mircea Diaconu|Rodica Tapalaga|Mircea Albulescu|Tania Filip|Alöd Kiss|Traian Costea|Ahmed Gabbany|Ioana Craciunescu|Constantin Brînzea|Radu Stoenescu|Mihai Oroveanu|Ioan Henter|Iosif Naghiu|Marcel Iures|Sorin Balaban|Mihai Persa|Dan Nasta|Ion Pascu|Dan Bubulici|Petrut Traian|Ion Niciu|Adrian Mihai
title: Artista, dolarii si Ardelenii
